title: Developer Ecosystem
description: How can we create a positive developer experience that helps the developer focus on building successful apps?

title: Open Source Development Ecosystem
description: How can we ensure that the Cardano ecosystem is built on a framework which is owned by the community and equally accessible to all?

title: Nation Building Dapps
description: What core Nation Building Dapp solutions can be provided for widespread users acquired in the developing world?

title: Cross-Chain Collaboration
description: How might we create connections and collaboration between Cardano and other blockchains in the next six months?

title: Cardano scaling solutions
description: What research and scaling implementations can be introduced to help Cardano increase scalability?

title: DApps and Integrations
description: What applications will provide the most value for end users in 2022?

title: Scale-UP Cardano's Community Hubs
description: How do we encourage Local Community Hubs to drive adoption and awareness of Cardano in 2022?

title: Gamers On - Chained
description: What Blockchain gaming applications should be developed to achieve mass adoption of Cardano?

title: Miscellaneous Challenge
description: How do we create a space for ideas and projects that do not fit any of the other current Challenges?

title: Grow Africa, Grow Cardano
description: How do we continue to seed and grow Cardano in Africa in 2022?

title: Accelerate Decentralized Identity
description: What solutions can we develop and implement with Atala PRISM to have the most positive impact and opportunities for rapid growth of Cardano

title: Grow East Asia, Grow Cardano
description: How do we grow the Cardano ecosystem in East Asia in an inclusive and supportive way? The same way we do in Africa, focused initiatives!

title: Business Solutions (B2B & B2C)
description: How can Cardano-based solutions help meet real business needs and what would be their impact?

title: Lobbying for favorable legislation
description: How can we defend ourselves from attacks by governments and compromising legislation and unfair tax policies on an ongoing basis?

title: Improve and Grow Auditability
description: How to make the auditing process of funded proposals efficient, distributed and transparent?

title: The Great Migration (from Ethereum)
description: How might we make it easy and fast for dApps and other projects to expand or completely move from Ethereum to Cardano?

title: Open Standards & Interoperability
description: Can we build an Open Ecosystem to drive growth, give equal opportunities to all, and increase the synergies across Cardano projects?

title: New Member Onboarding
description: How might we make it faster and easier for new Catalyst members to take on suitable roles and responsibilities in 2022?

title: Self-Sovereign Identity
description: How can we take the next step to support the principles of self-sovereign identity

title: Film + Media (FAM) creatives unite!
description: Global entertainment+media market = $2 trillion. A decentralized FAM network to produce quality Cardano community media is vital yet absent.

title: Community Advisor Improvements
description: Community Advisors are an evolving key role of Project Catalyst and need a place and budget to submit proposals to improve their performance

title: Grow India, Grow Cardano
description: How can we grow Cardano development and adoption in India?

title: Fund9 challenge setting
description: What Challenges should the community prioritize to address in Fund9?
